scripts.build: BABEL_ENV=production npm run scripts && npm run styles && git add --all && git commit -m 'chore: build files'
scripts.release:patch: yarn build && npx standard-version -t '' -r patch && git push --follow-tags origin main
scripts.release:minor: yarn build && npx standard-version -t '' -r minor && git push --follow-tags origin main
scripts.release:major: yarn build && npx standard-version -t '' -r major && git push --follow-tags origin main
